LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin.label: 버섯 재배기
LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin.description: Derived from the hydroponics basins, the fungiponics basin is designed to grow cave plants. Does only require some initial organic matter to start growing. Sowing 버섯s is difficult and those plants grow at their own pace
LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: fungiponics basin (청사진)
LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin_Frame.label: fungiponics basin (건설 중)
LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin_Frame.description: Derived from the hydroponics basins, the fungiponics basin is designed to grow cave plants. Does only require some initial organic matter to start growing. Sowing 버섯s is difficult and those plants grow at their own pace
